name: The Last Express
summary: Step aboard the 1914 Orient Express in this award-winning mystery adventure from Prince of Persia creator Jordan Mechner. Described as one of the best adventure games of all time, The Last Express is an intrigue-filled adventure set aboard the luxurious Orient Express.
info:
• 中文名: 东方快车谋杀案
  • 平台: Windows, Mac os
  • 游戏类型: 冒险
  • 发行日期: 1997年3月31日
  • 官方网站: http://store.steampowered.com/app/252710/The_Last_Express_Gold_Edition/
